sentences.en: Agreement was reached on several ancillary matters.
sentences.cn: 就一些相关问题达成了协议。

sentences.en: Ancillary charges are at least $30 per day.
sentences.cn: 附加收费每天至少30美元。

sentences.en: Ancillary Current Router now specifies that the bonus is in percentage.
sentences.cn: 辅助电源路由器数据中将注明加成为百分比值.

sentences.en: At present, AGC ancillary service has became a hot research spot.
sentences.cn: 目前, 电力市场AGC辅助服务问题已经成为众多学者和电力公司的研究热点.

sentences.en: For Degas, sculpture was never more than ancillary to his painting ( Herbert Read )
sentences.cn: 对于德加来说, 雕刻不过是从属于绘画的一门艺术 ( 赫伯特里德 )

sentences.en: Hose automatic production line is the other ancillary facilities.
sentences.cn: 是软管生产自动流水线中的配套设备.

sentences.en: Hydropower, and other ancillary equipment to meet the company's production full capacity.
sentences.cn: 水电等配套设备可满足公司的满负荷生产.

sentences.en: In 1916, Yeomans added the Shone ? Pneumatic Ejector and other ancillary equipment.
sentences.cn: 1916年, 约曼的产品系列有增加了气动喷射泵和其它辅助设备.

sentences.en: It is also an ancillary end product for power load management system.
sentences.cn: 也是电力负荷管理系统的配套终端产品.

sentences.en: Monorail trolley is a kind of ancillary facilities.
sentences.cn: 单轨小车是一种配套设备.

sentences.en: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
sentences.cn: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

sentences.en: The ancillary systems of plasma ignition are also involved in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文还涉及了等离子点火的各辅助系统.

sentences.en: The transport corps is ancillary to the infantry.
sentences.cn: 运输队是步兵的辅助部队.

sentences.en: This is just an ancillary business.
sentences.cn: 这仅仅是一项辅助业务.

sentences.en: Two - way ventilation axial fans high temperature, ventilation and other ancillary products.
sentences.cn: 双向 通风耐高温轴流风机、等通风配套产品.

sentences.en: Warehouse Library area complete with fire equipment and ancillary facilities.
sentences.cn: 仓库区域,配备完善的消防器材及辅助设施.

phrases.tran_cn: 辅助设备；外部设备；外围设备

trans.tran_cn: 辅助的，补充的，附属的，附加的
trans.tran_en: connected with or supporting something else, but less important than it
